declarations.comments:
A specialization of `Tree` for the tree of actual tests. While `Tree` is a
tree of abstract things, `SpecTree` is a tree of tests, each represented by
`Item`.
declarations.title: SpecTree

declarations.comments: Collects all tests, if something is focused, all unfocused tests will be discarded
declarations.title: collect

declarations.comments: marks all spec items of the given spec to be safe for parallel evaluation.
declarations.title: parallel

declarations.comments: marks all spec items of the given spec to be evaluated sequentially.
declarations.title: sequential

declarations.comments: Nullary class used to raise a custom warning for the focusing functions.
declarations.title: FocusWarning

declarations.comments:
`focus` focuses all spec items of the given spec.

Applying `focus` to a spec with focused spec items has no effect.
declarations.title: focus

declarations.comments:
Combine a group of specs into a described hierarchy and mark it as the
only group to actually be evaluated. (useful for quickly narrowing down
on a set)
declarations.title: describeOnly

declarations.comments:
Create a spec with a description and mark it as the only one to
be run. (useful for quickly narrowing down on a single test)
declarations.title: itOnly

declarations.comments: Combine a group of specs into a described hierarchy.
declarations.title: describe

declarations.comments: Create a spec with a description.
declarations.title: it

declarations.comments: Create a pending spec.
declarations.title: pending

declarations.comments:
Create a pending spec with a body that is ignored by
the runner. It can be useful for documenting what the
spec should test when non-pending.
declarations.title: pending'

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before and/or after every spec item.
declarations.title: aroundWith

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before and/or after every spec item.
declarations.title: around

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before and/or after every spec item.
declarations.title: around_

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before every spec item.
declarations.title: before

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before every spec item.
declarations.title: before_

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before every spec item.
declarations.title: beforeWith

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before the first spec item.
declarations.title: beforeAll

declarations.comments: Run a custom action before the first spec item.
declarations.title: beforeAll_

declarations.comments: Run a custom action after every spec item.
declarations.title: after

declarations.comments: Run a custom action after every spec item.
declarations.title: after_

declarations.comments: Run a custom action after the last spec item.
declarations.title: afterAll

declarations.comments: Run a custom action after the last spec item.
declarations.title: afterAll_
